ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Man has only to look at what he was created from.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Let man consider what he was made of:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So let man consider of what he was created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Let the human being reflect that from what he has been created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So man must consider from what he has been created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, let man see from what he is created!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So let man consider of what he is created:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So let man consider of what he was created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So let man consider from what he is created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Let man reflect on what he was created from.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So let man look - from what is he created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So let man consider from what he was created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Now let man but think from what he is created!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So let man see from what he is created!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Let the human reflect of what he is created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Let man consider what he was created from.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So let man observe from what he was created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:5] So let man consider, by way of reflection, from what he was created, from what thing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So let man) Abu Talib (consider from what he is created) from what his soul is created.
